archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: EU Pharmacovigilance Issues Tracking tool (EPITT)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: - Database developed by EMA to promote the rapid communication of pharmacovigilance and risk management issues between the EMA, Committees and NCAs. - All signals validated by EMA and MSs are entered in EPITT. - Further steps of the signal management process (confirmation and evaluation) are also tracked in EPITT.
